content: notes 1 tee is made from 2 pieces back and front 2 shoulders are seamed and sleeves are worked directly into armholes 3 tee is worked with short sleeves a long sleeve version is also provided **sizes** s m l 1x 2x 3x 4x 5x finished bust 38½ 41½ 44½ 47½ 50½ 53½ 56½ 59 in / 98 105 5 113 120 5 128 5 136 143 5 150 cm finished length 23 23¼ 23½ 23¾ 24 24¼ 24½ 24¾ in / 58 5 59 59 5 60 5 61 61 5 62 63 cm **materials** lion brand® 24/7 cotton® art #761 #116 succulent 5 5 5 6 6 6 7 7 balls lion brand® knitting needles size 6 4 mm lion brand® stitch markers lion brand® large-eyed blunt needle additional materials circular needle size 4 3 5 mm 16 in 40 5 cm long circular needle size 4 3 5 mm 24 in 40 5 cm long circular needle size 6 4 mm 24 in 40 5 cm long raveler s note there is a typo on the instructions for front construction instruction for row 10-21 should state repeat row 8 and 9 for 6 more times not repeat row 6 and 7 for 6 more times
